definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Jatropha curcas is a non-edible shrub that is native to Central America.
sentences.chinese: 桐油樹是一種不可食用的灌木，原產於中美洲。

sentences.english: The Mayans lived in Central America thousands of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 數千年前，瑪雅人生活在中美洲。

sentences.english: Plus, of course, Central America, which has remained steadfastly pro-Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 當然，還有中美洲，此地仍然堅定的支持臺灣。

sentences.english: The Mesoamerican ballgame originated over three thousand years ago.
sentences.chinese: 而中美洲的球賽已有超過三千年的歷史。

sentences.english: We beamed the program to the countries of Central America.
sentences.chinese: 我們向中美洲國家播送節目。

sentences.english: Europe and emigrated to the eastern coast of central America.
sentences.chinese: 這些人越過歐洲和移民的東海岸，中美洲。

sentences.english: Let me tell you about a native plant in Central America.
sentences.chinese: 讓我告訴你，在中美洲有一種土生的植物。

sentences.english: Around A. D. 600, the Mayas were the main aboriginal group in Central America.
sentences.chinese: 公元600年左右，瑪雅人是中美洲主要的土著居民。

sentences.english: Six Central American countries improved their household surveys on living standards.
sentences.chinese: 六個中美洲國家完善了生活水平入戶調查方法。

sentences.english: The continuing violence in Mexico and Central America is of deep concern.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥和中美洲持續不斷的暴力事件令人深爲憂慮。

sentences.english: Il Panama si trova nell'America centrale.
But the Zapotec also played a vital role in ancient Mesoamerica.
sentences.chinese: 然而，薩巴特克也在古代中美洲扮演了重要的角色。

sentences.english: Today some 60 Garífuna fishing villages dot the Central American coast.
sentences.chinese: 如今大約有60個加里富納漁村散佈在中美洲海岸上。

sentences.english: It is bordered by the United States on the north and by Guatemala and Belize on the south.
sentences.chinese: 北與美國接攘，南與中美洲的危地馬拉和貝利茲相鄰。

sentences.english: They owned vast banana plantations in Guatemala and Central America.
sentences.chinese: 他們在危地馬拉和中美洲擁有廣大的香蕉大種植園。

sentences.english: See, for example, the Creation Science Association for Mid-America, in Cleveland, MO, USA.
sentences.chinese: 例如去領會創造科學聯合中美洲，在美國MO城市。

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2
